Author: tea-addicted-taemint
Text: Mostly I don't. Friends with EDs who aren't taking steps to recovery can honestly be some of the most triggering people on this planet - you both know the other has behaviours and shit gets competitive quick.  I had a male acquaintance with AN I basically stopped hanging out with for this reason as it was too much for me. Make yourself and your health a priority even if it involves losing friends.
